mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment (id, pay_status, pay_name, pay_email, pay_phone_number, reservation_id) VALUES (payment_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{payStatus}, #{payName}, #{payEmail}, SUBSTR(#{payPhoneNumber}, 1, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(#{payPhoneNumber}, 4, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(#{payPhoneNumber}, 8), #{reservationId})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(p.reservation_id) AS "count" FROM PAYMENT p JOIN RESERVATION res ON p.reservation_id = res.ID WHERE p.RESERVATION_ID = #{reservationId}
